rules: Rule1: If the organization uses satellite imaging technology, then the forest achieves conservation.
Rule2: Under the condition that the organization monitors the coastline area, it follows that the organization monitors the forest area.
Rule3: Whenever the forest has detected illegal logging as a threat, the organization monitors the wetland area.
Rule4: Either the forest has detected illegal logging as a threat or the coastline has detected pollution as a threat.
Rule5: If the organization has authorization for monitoring, then whenever the coastline has detected pollution as a threat, the organization monitors the coastline area.
Rule6: In the event that the organization follows protocols, it is not the case that the organization violates regulations.
Rule7: Should the organization implement safeguards, then the organization does not violate regulations.
Rule8: If the organization reports findings, then the organization follows protocols.
Rule9: Provided that the organization conducts an audit, it implements safeguards.
Rule10: The organization publishes a report or submits confidential information.
Rule11: If the organization submits confidential information, then it conducts an audit.
Rule12: In the event that the organization shares data, it reports findings.
Rule13: If the organization receives a warning, then it is not the case that the organization faces penalties.
Rule14: Under the condition that the agency is a regulatory body, it issues a directive.
Rule15: If the agency reviews compliance, then if it is not the case that if the organization publishes a report then it reports findings, the organization receives a warning.
Rule16: The agency imposes sanctions or it does not initiate an investigation.
Rule17: If the organization has government funding, then if it does not use satellite imaging technology, it uses drone survey technology.
Rule18: Either the organization has government funding or it has private funding.
Rule19: In the event that the agency grants an extension, it does not impose sanctions.
Rule20: The agency grants an extension or provides assistance.
Rule21: Whenever the agency provides assistance, it does not impose sanctions.

Rule22: If the government approved funding for the organization, then if the organization has private funding, under the condition that it does not use satellite imaging technology, it uses drone survey technology.
Rule23: Either the government approved funding for the organization or the private entity approved funding for the organization.
Rule24: If the private entity approved funding for the organization, then the organization processed the funding.
Rule25: In the event that the organization processed the funding, then if it has private funding, whenever it does not use satellite imaging technology, it uses drone survey technology.
Rule26: Should the organization monitor the forest area, the forest achieves conservation.
Rule27: If the organization monitors the wetland area, then it monitors the forest area.
Rule28: If it is not the case that if the organization publishes a report then it reports findings, the organization faces penalties.
Rule29: Whenever it is not the case that if the organization publishes a report then it shares data, the organization withholds information.
Rule30: Should it not be the case that if the agency issues a directive then it reviews compliance, the agency initiates an investigation.
Rule31: If the organization does not use satellite imaging technology, then it does not use drone survey technology.
Rule32: Provided that the forest does not achieve conservation, the organization violates regulations.
facts: Fact1: The organization has authorization for monitoring.
Fact2: The agency is a regulatory body.
Fact3: The organization does not withhold information.
